HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Dopravné ZDARMA při objednávce nad 2.500 Kč.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Zpravidla do druhého dne od expedice.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Dopravné ZDARMA při objednávce nad 2.500 Kč.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Dopravné ZDARMA při objednávce nad 2.500 Kč.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, Parcel Shops/Pickup Points, and In-Store Pickup are available. PROVIDERS: DPD, PPL, Balíkovna (Česká pošta), and Zásilkovna. PRICING: Free shipping is offered for orders over 2,500 CZK. Standard shipping costs for orders below this threshold are not specified. Bulky items have custom shipping costs calculated individually. In-store pickup pricing is not mentioned. COD is an option, but any associated surcharge is not listed. NOTABLE FEATURES: Home delivery is generally next business day after dispatch. In-store pickup is available at three locations: Litvínov, Ústí nad Labem, and Teplice. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information page clearly outlines the available delivery methods and providers. However, it lacks crucial details such as base shipping prices and any potential COD surcharges. Information on express or weekend delivery is also absent.
